description.displayText: Hannah is a very sweet girl who has many talents for entertaining kids.
description.originalText: Hannah is a very sweet girl who has many talents for entertaining kids.

description.displayText: Hannah took care of our son when he was an infant, from ages 6 to 12 months. Hannah is a fantastic caregiver. She is friendly, punctual, kind, and has a warm, creative spirit. Our son had an immediate connection to her from their first meeting. From changing diapers, to feedings, to putting him down for a nap, Hannah handled all the responsibilities of the job exceedingly well. Our family will miss her tremendously.
description.originalText: Hannah took care of our son when he was an infant, from ages 6 to 12 months. Hannah is a fantastic caregiver. She is friendly, punctual, kind, and has a warm, creative spirit. Our son had an immediate connection to her from their first meeting. From changing diapers, to feedings, to putting him down for a nap, Hannah handled all the responsibilities of the job exceedingly well. Our family will miss her tremendously.

description.displayText: Hannah was an excellent caregiver to our son.  She worked with us when he was an infant, from ages 6 months to 1 year. Their connection was immediate. She has a warm personality and a creative spirit.  She was always punctual and reliable, and was flexible about coming early or staying an extra hour on occasion. My son will miss her, and so will we. I highly recommend her as a caregiver.
description.originalText: Hannah was an excellent caregiver to our son.  She worked with us when he was an infant, from ages 6 months to 1 year. Their connection was immediate. She has a warm personality and a creative spirit.  She was always punctual and reliable, and was flexible about coming early or staying an extra hour on occasion. My son will miss her, and so will we. I highly recommend her as a caregiver.

description.displayText: Hannah is the most mature and responsible caregiver I know. She's super intelligent and works great under pressure, as well as being an excellent illustrator.
description.originalText: Hannah is the most mature and responsible caregiver I know. She's super intelligent and works great under pressure, as well as being an excellent illustrator.
